article_title: How Rick Perry Could Warm To Obamacare's Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Political pressures and a threat to financial coffers from rising numbers of uninsured have Texas lawmakers thinking about ways to expand the state Medicaid insurance program for the poor, including a deal with the Obama administration. Last week, while a grand jury indictment against Gov. Rick Perry grabbed much of the [...]
